label: lem-uniform-geometric-ergodicity
name: Uniform Geometric Ergodicity
proof_strategy: Lyapunov drift (V = 1 + E^2) + minorization via cloning noise + Meyn-Tweedie theorem
drift_condition: E[V(T^dt(S)) | S] <= (1 - kappa_E * dt) V(S) + C_4 * dt
minorization_mechanism: Gaussian cloning noise provides full support for irreducibility
notes: Key for connecting local to global errors via Poisson equation
Drift constants kappa_E, C_4 independent of dt
Minorization constant delta_minor independent of dt
Mixing rate kappa_mix = kappa_E (for dt small)
Cloning provides irreducibility; friction provides drift
